allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update project constitution with hackathon requirements

- Rename Hackathon Speed to Hackathon Efficiency with "Done is better than perfect" principle
- Update Academic Rigor to focus on professional, university-level content
- Change Modularity to Modular Architecture with Phase 2 preparation focus
- Add Context Awareness principle requiring checking specs/tasks.md
- Update Code Quality to include Python for script generation
- Update Technology Stack to include Python for scripting tasks

These changes align the project constitution with the hackathon requirements:
1. Hackathon Efficiency: "Done is better than perfect"
2. Academic Rigor: Technically accurate, professional content for students
3. Modular Architecture: Preparing for Chatbot and Auth in Phase 2
4. Code Quality: TypeScript for frontend, Python for scripting
5. Context Awareness: Always check specs/tasks.md before starting work

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "Phase 1: Book Structure and Modules 1 & 2")
Bash(git commit -m "Update GitHub Pages workflow to use gh-pages branch")
Bash(git commit -m "Update workflow to deploy to docs folder for GitHub Pages")
Bash(git commit -m "Add .nojekyll file to disable Jekyll processing")
Bash(git commit -m "Revert to gh-pages branch deployment")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Configure GitHub Pages baseUrl and Actions

- Add trailingSlash: false to Docusaurus config
- Configure GitHub Actions workflow for deployment to GitHub Pages
- Update workflow to build from frontend directory
- Add proper deployment configuration with peaceiris/actions-gh-pages

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "Update GitHub Pages workflow to deploy to docs folder for GitHub Pages")
Bash(git commit -m "Configure GitHub Pages to disable Jekyll processing" --amend)
Bash(git commit -m "Add GitHub Pages configuration to disable Jekyll processing")
